questions.question: What does Joey drink from the fridge, thinking it's cider?
questions.explanation: Joey drinks from the glass and puts it back in the fridge, saying 'Yep, it's fat. I drank fat!'

questions.question: How much time does Ross say they have to get dressed before they have to leave?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Four minutes ago you had a half hour, we have to be out the door at twenty to eight.'

questions.question: What is Phoebe's reaction when Joey flings dip onto her dress?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Ah! Oh my God! You r-r-rotten boys!'

questions.question: Why does Monica call Richard's answering machine?
options: To leave a message for him
To check if a message is old or new
questions.correct_answer: To check if a message is old or new
questions.explanation: Monica says 'I just got in. I just got this message from you and I didn't know if it was old or new or what.'

questions.question: What does Ross offer to do to prove his love for Rachel?
options: Drink a whole bottle of wine
questions.explanation: Ross says 'If that is what it takes to show you how much you mean to me, and how much I want you there. Then that's what I'll do.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's initial reluctance to attend the banquet?
options: She doesn't want to dress up
She's upset with Ross for yelling at her
questions.correct_answer: She's upset with Ross for yelling at her
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'Ever since I was humiliated and yelled at in front of my friends, I'm just, I don't know, not in a museum benefitty kind of mood.'

questions.question: What does Monica accidentally record on Richard's answering machine?
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Outgoing! Did that say outgoing?! Not, outgoing!!!'

questions.question: What does Chandler say is the 'essence of the chair'?
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'The cushions are the essence of the chair!'

questions.question: Why does Joey take all of Chandler's clothes?
options: Because Chandler took his favorite shirt
Because Joey wanted to play a prank on him
questions.explanation: Joey says 'You hide my clothes, I'm wearing everything you own.'

questions.question: What does Rachel reveal to Ross at the end of the episode?
options: She's not going to the banquet
questions.explanation: Rachel says 'And, uh, by the way.... I'm going commando, too.'

questions.question: What is the name of the person Ross meets at the banquet?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Wow! What a pleasure.' to Sherman Whitfield

questions.question: What is the topic of Ross's paper that impresses Sherman Whitfield?
questions.explanation: Sherman Whitfield says 'I was quite impressed with your paper on Pre-Cretaceous fossils.'

questions.question: Why does Chandler get into an argument with Sherman Whitfield?
options: Because Sherman Whitfield is sitting in his seat
Because Sherman Whitfield is talking to Ross
Because Sherman Whitfield is eating his food
Because Sherman Whitfield is laughing at him
questions.correct_answer: Because Sherman Whitfield is sitting in his seat
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Excuse me. Hi. Well, your kind of sitting in my seat.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe use to cover up the stain on her dress?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Rachel, didn't have anything that I liked, so, but she had this Christmas ribbon, and I thought, 'All right, fine I'll be political.'

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she's trying to decide what shoes to wear?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Just, just, just pick one!'

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's phone call to Michelle?
options: To ask her out on a date
To ask for her help with something
questions.explanation: Monica says 'I gotta call Michelle. I gotta see if that was her voice or not.'

questions.question: What does Joey do when Chandler hides his underwear?
options: He gets angry and yells at Chandler
He wears all of Chandler's clothes
questions.correct_answer: He wears all of Chandler's clothes
questions.explanation: Joey says 'You hide my clothes, I'm wearing everything you own.'

questions.question: What is the result of Monica's phone call to Richard's answering machine?
options: She leaves a message for Richard
She erases a message from Michelle
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Outgoing! Did that say outgoing?! Not, outgoing!!!'

questions.question: What does Ross do when Rachel says she's not going to the banquet?
options: He gets angry and yells at her
He tries to convince her to go
He says he's not going either
questions.correct_answer: He tries to convince her to go
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Look Rach, I'm sorry. Okay. Look, I-I wa, I was a jerk. I'm sorry I yelled. I want you there, I need you there.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's initial reluctance to wear Monica's green dress?
options: It won't go with her shoes
It won't go with Rachel's black jacket
questions.correct_answer: It won't go with Rachel's black jacket
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'That won't go with this dress though.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say to Joey when he's sitting in the chair?
options: I'm going to sit on your lap
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'Get up.'

questions.question: What is the result of Monica's conversation with Michelle on the phone?
options: Michelle agrees to meet up with Monica
Michelle tells Monica to leave Richard alone
Michelle says she's not interested in talking to Monica
questions.explanation: Monica says 'That bitch always hated me. I'm calling her back.'

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she's getting dressed?
options: I don't care what you wear
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Look, I don't know what you're trying to do to me, but just get your butt in there and pick out any shoes that fit your feet, okay.'

questions.question: What does Joey do when Chandler tries to take the chair from him?
options: He gets up and gives Chandler the chair
He stays seated and refuses to move
He takes the cushions and walks away
questions.correct_answer: He takes the cushions and walks away
questions.explanation: Joey says 'You said I had to give you the chair, you didn't say anything about the cushions.'

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's initial call to Richard's answering machine?
options: To leave a message for him
To check if a message is old or new
questions.correct_answer: To check if a message is old or new
questions.explanation: Monica says 'I just got in. I just got this message from you and I didn't know if it was old or new or what.'

questions.question: What does Phoebe say when she's trying on Monica's green dress?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says 'Oh Rach, good, listen isn't this perfect for me!'

questions.question: What does Ross say to Rachel when she says she's not going to the banquet?
options: I don't care if you go or not
I want you to go with me
questions.correct_answer: I want you to go with me
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Look Rach, I'm sorry. Okay. Look, I-I wa, I was a jerk. I'm sorry I yelled. I want you there, I need you there.'

questions.question: What does Chandler say when Joey is wearing all of his clothes?
options: That's not the opposite of hiding your underwear
I'm going to get you back for this
You're really hot in all those clothes
questions.correct_answer: That's not the opposite of hiding your underwear
questions.explanation: Chandler says 'What are you, what are you gonna show me my clothes?'

questions.question: What does Monica do when she realizes she's recorded her outgoing message on Richard's answering machine?
options: She tries to call him back to apologize
She tries to erase the message
She leaves another message to explain
She hangs up and doesn't do anything
questions.correct_answer: She tries to erase the message
questions.explanation: Monica says 'Maybe we could call the phone company. Maybe they could change the message.'

questions.question: What does Ross do when Rachel says she's going commando?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'Awwww!!!'
